reviews.review: Oyun dünyasının en bilindik ve ilk akla gelen karakterlerinden Gordon Freeman'ın macerasına yıllar sonra ortak oldum. Half Life nedir falan falan diye hiç söz etmeyeceğim. Oyun dünyasının giriş kitabıdır Half Life. İlk oyundaki seviyesinden hiç düşmeyip grafikleriyle -dönemine göre- daha da üstüne çıkmış. Half Life 3'ün çıkmama sebebi herhalde "bıraktığımız seviyenin üstüne çıkabilir miyiz acaba" sorusu ve çıkamama korkusu. Hikayenin sağlamlığı ve sunuluşu, oyuncuyu sıkmayan rahat oynanışıyla yıllar sonra bile adından hâlâ söz ettiriyor.

Half-Life 2, pokračování známé Half-Life Jedničky. Hru jsem dohrál a rovnou můžu říct že hra stojí za to!

Half-Life 2 si určitě užijete i když je 16 let stará, zajímavé postavy a příběh také, líbí se mi že hra je plná záhad a lze i po 16 letech stále spekulovat nad příběhem. Samozřejmě hra obsahuje i nudné mise, popravdě nejnudnější část byla jak jezdíte na tom autě ve vodě a počas toho řešíte hádanky jak si otevřít cestu dál. Hra vůbec nelaguje a rozjede se vám i na starších bednách. Počas hry si najdete oblíbené postavy které jsou pro vás nejvíc sympatické a tím pádem jste rádi/neradi když danou postavu máte v misi xd. Popravdě hru si podruhé nezahraju protože už to není o no jak jsem poprvé ten příběh skutečně prožíval. Koupil jsem si Garry's Mod ve kterém lze levely Half-Lifu procházet s GhostModem, zajimavý to vidět.

[b][h1] Half Life 2 [/h1][/b]

es una continuación bien adaptada y relacionada a los acontecimientos del primer titulo [b]''Half Life 1''[/b], también este juego cuenta con una ''historia'' bien desarrollada a lo largo de su gameplay. La jugabilidad es excelente mas allá de que el motor habbo presente algunos errores en lo que es el ragdoll y bueno. Es un juego que nadie debería perderse ya que es un juego de cultura por decirlo de algún modo y también merece el merito del mejor FPS de su epoca, por las mecanicas innovadoras y demás...

[b]Puntuación Final: 9/10[/b]

An absolute classic, completely revolutionary for it's time.

Half Life 2 created many conventions still used to this day in first person shooters.

For the shooter genre, I'd almost go so far as to say its unrivaled in it's atmosphere and environmental storytelling TO THIS DAY. Storytelling is done through brief bits of character exposition in interactive scenes where the game almost never takes control from the player, there are only two "cutscenes," being the intro and the final scene.

Still a blast to play, especially if you enjoy gaming history.

So, its 2019 and this was the first half life game I've ever played, I had heard of the franchise remotely previously, on the internet, and now I understand why it is so venerated because it is oodles of fun. 
I finished the game in 2 days on easy difficulty. And man was it an experience to be had. The whole way through it is nonstop action, with brief periods of denouement, scripted animation and comic relief from the characters which are very lovable from the scientist with the pet headcrab and Alyx and her robot pet named Dog. This was contrasted by the cold, alien extradimensional threat called the combine, which made the story feel important and helps the player feel emotionally invested. It was for me the perfect portrayal of a dystopian world in which what is fundamentally human is subverted and made alien. I found the game to be great, it was the right blend of running and gunning and evading villains. The different zones all convey their own feel to the game and make it thematically diverse.  
At times the gameplay would become boring and I would take breaks, but Id come back and find the game refreshed by the introduction of new enemies, ambushes and new weapons and vehicles or situations to test your ability to reason and figure out a way around obstacles or hazards, at times id be lost, but the puzzles were not too hard and i found it satisfying to solve them eventually. The ragdoll is great, and the physics feels real when you shotgun enemies or use explosives in the game.
I am glad I played half life 2 as a gamer and rate it 10/10 because previously I had never played anything like it, except maybe counterstrike source, which i enjoy immensely also. The game is cheap and in my opinion well worth the time spent to play through it and a gaming experience unlike any other.

对于04年来说神作吧，就如今除了画质老了点其他都非常优秀。但对于我来说这游戏有点难，有时候甚至卡关半小时无奈找攻略。队友都是小米加步枪，敌人都是坦克飞机迫击炮。敌人枪法个个都是艾利克斯级别，我方只会送，虽然会给我点医疗包，但我想找掩体的时候老是卡我位。没有狙击枪，没有瞄准镜，距离远了我根本打不到。虽然有个火箭筒，但是距离太远的话，敌人直接拦截火箭炮，贴脸炸死自己，敌人护甲也很厚，RPG打在身上跟挠痒一样。在敌人的枪林弹雨中，找不到路，找掩体队友卡位，两三个弹夹的RPG打出去敌人还没倒，经常有想砸电脑的冲动。第一人称开车可太晕了。我坚持通关了，虽然有不愉快，但总体来说这游戏还是非常优秀的！
